goal.en: Interrogate science fiction as the non-human heart of the human enterprise. Writing is a science fiction technology making the voice obsolete. There is always silence behind Science Fiction. Universal silence. Soon humans will speak no more. Or very quietly. That‘s why science fiction replaced God. A still small voice suggesting everything is not as it was designed.
goal.ch: Interrogate science fiction as the non-human heart of the human enterprise. Writing is a science fiction technology making the voice obsolete. There is always silence behind science fiction. Universal silence. Science Fiction is a dead god. Soon humans will speak no more. Good. A still small voice suggesting everything is or is not as it was designed.
